vcf

Class VariantSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • vcf.VariantSet

  • public class VariantSet
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores in memory a Vcf file data. Variant Call Format (VCF) Version 4.2.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String EMPTY_VALUE 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      VariantSet()
      Creates a new VariantSet with an empty header.
      VariantSet(VcfHeader header)
      Creates a new VariantSet using the given header.

      • removeSample

        public void removeSample(java.lang.String name)
        Completely removes sample info from VariantSet. Sample info is deleted from every Variant in VariantSet, and sample name is removed from VariantSetHeader.
        Parameters:
        name - sample name
